page.title: 18Adstock Manor & Stud Farm
page.content: There is one stallion called "High line" who covers mares brought by their owners.There are 40 foals born in 1985. There are 5 stable yards. RECENTLY BUILT ADDITIONS: 5 foaling units built in 1984,2 winter feed store rooms,17 yearling stables,a covering stabling yard,a large straw/hay barn, 5 ight boxes,5 a feed room. BUILDINGS IN USE SINCE 1847:A yard for the Manors own 4 hunters & 4 point to pointers,a small hay barn,a wood store, & 12 stables. There are 7 farm helps,who live in 5 cottages on the manor land.
